description: Karasuma Ooji is a classmate of the lead characters`, and http://anidb.net/ch72 [Tsukamoto Tenma]`s love interest. He loves curry, and he is rather unusual in several ways: he enjoys dressing as a kappa, he has a complete lack of facial expression, and he also has unexpected skills such as riding a bike very fast or driving buses.
name: Karasuma Ooji
